about_the_game:
Swap pictures of your kingdom around to complete your buildings. Direct the Knights and soldiers from your buildings to fight demons and capture the Middle Kingdom. Single player mode and local 2 player mode. The initial tutorial is only 10 seconds to play with procedurally generated variations,.
Full release game also has remote multiplayer and co-op modes on 5 maps , 5 levels of difficulty and 4 computer opponents in single player. In PvP mode all maps and difficulty levels are available.
detailed_description:
Swap pictures of your kingdom around to complete your buildings. Direct the Knights and soldiers from your buildings to fight demons and capture the Middle Kingdom. Single player mode and local 2 player mode. The initial tutorial is only 10 seconds to play with procedurally generated variations,.
Full release game also has remote multiplayer and co-op modes on 5 maps , 5 levels of difficulty and 4 computer opponents in single player. In PvP mode all maps and difficulty levels are available.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 12.5
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

name: SwapPics: Knights vs Demons Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Swap pictures of your kingdom around to complete your buildings. Direct the Knights and soldiers from your buildings to fight demons and capture the Middle Kingdom. Single player mode and local or Remote 2 player mode. The initial tutorial is only 10 seconds. 6 maps and 5 levels of difficulty.
